query:
SELECT 
            id,
            CASE 
                WHEN TRIM(COALESCE(nom, '') || ' ' || COALESCE(prenom, '')) = '' 
                THEN split_part(email, '@', 1)
                ELSE TRIM(COALESCE(nom, '') || ' ' || COALESCE(prenom, ''))
            END as nom_complet,
            email,
            is_provider,
            gps,
            photo_profil,
            avatar_url,
            created_at
        FROM users 
        WHERE is_provider = true
        ORDER BY CASE 
                WHEN TRIM(COALESCE(nom, '') || ' ' || COALESCE(prenom, '')) = '' 
                THEN split_part(email, '@', 1)
                ELSE TRIM(COALESCE(nom, '') || ' ' || COALESCE(prenom, ''))
            END, created_at
